Instruction: Heat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) and prepare a 9x5-inch loaf pan by greasing it.

In a large bowl, mix together the flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, and baking soda. Combine the egg and buttermilk, then add all at once to the flour mixture, mixing just until moistened. Stir in the butter. Transfer the mixture into the greased pan.

Bake in the oven until the top turns golden brown, approximately 65 to 70 minutes. Use a toothpick to check for doneness; it should come out clean when inserted into the bread. Allow the bread to cool on a wire rack.
